This is garbage. This is the NTR with the biggest case of identity crisis ever. It wants to be NTR, but at the same time it feels like the girls are unaffected by everything. They're all dating someone else and having fulfilling lives with other guys. What's worse, the teacher constantly asks them about the sex that they have with their respective partners (??????). That's such a cuck thing to do when you don't even elaborate on how the teacher is better than the other guys. I just read 200 pages of something that felt like 20. Everything is so empty and meaningless. I still fapped, but I can't add this trash to my favorites.

@Moskol by my indications, strong ntr mostly exhibit the perspective of the cuck aka the cheated and sometimes the blackmailed/mind breaked cheater.
